description: A handful tiny puzzle piece of opalescent metal no bigger than a watermelon seed, when you gather too many in the same place they seem to gravitate toward eachother as if by magnets.
A tiny piece of opalescent metal no bigger than a coin, when you gather too many in the same place they seem to gravitate toward eachother as if by magnets.

variants.description: A small round disk of opalescent metal no bigger than a coin.  This bears has a spatter of four pointed stars on it in antique gilding.
A small round disk of opalescent metal no bigger than a coin.  This one bears a wreath of three flowers on it encircling a withered rose in antique gilding.
A small round disk of opalescent metal no bigger than a coin.  This one bears a mountain of bones beneath a stag skull in antique gilding.
A small round disk of opalescent metal no bigger than a coin.  This one bears a circle of 13 feathers spiraled around a candle in antique gilding.
A small round disk of opalescent metal no bigger than a coin.  This one bears a palm print with a thumb on either side which is mirrored on bottom half, all in antique gilding.

A small round disk of opalescent metal no bigger than a coin.  This one bears a quartarly ornate crest on it in antique gilding.  Each corner has a different image, a 3 petal rose with 4 thorns, an antlered human skull, a palm print with 2 thumbs, and a spiral of feathers.
A small round disk of opalescent metal no bigger than a coin.  This one bears a triangle of daggers with fluorescent fingerprints and emotions on each blade, all in antique gilding.

A small round disk of opalescent metal no bigger than a coin.  This one bears a pond with the top of a womans head peeking out of it, her hair floats on the surface in tangles, all in antique gilding.
A small round disk of opalescent metal no bigger than a coin.  This one bears shifting images of your memories in antique gilding.
